meaning list.sentence translation: Na te au kaha i toia nga mea katoa i tona ara.

meaning list.meaning: kia rite ki tetahi (ina koa he mema o te whanau)

meaning list.sentence: He took apart the clock to see how it worked.

meaning list.sentence: The critics took apart the movie.

meaning list.meaning: Te tango i tetahi ki tahaki (ki te korero takitahi)

meaning list.sentence translation: I toia ahau e ia ki te taha ki te korero ki ahau mo nga korero.

meaning list.meaning: tahae ka oma atu, tangohia atu

meaning list.meaning: te korero autaki, te karo i te kaupapa

meaning list.meaning: Te whakaaro ki mua, te whakamahere

meaning list.meaning: ki te whakaaro whakamuri, ki te mahara

meaning list.sentence: He managed to throw off his doubts and move forward.

meaning list.meaning: ki te ohorere tetahi, ki te maka i te tangata i te toenga

meaning list.sentence: He touched on the main points during his presentation.

meaning list.meaning: Te hoki ki te puna ma te whai

meaning list.meaning: te tuku i tetahi mea ki te whiwhi i tetahi atu mea

meaning list.sentence: I’ll wash up after dinner.

meaning list.sentence: The lengthy negotiations wore him down.

meaning list.meaning: Whakangwari (he hu hou, he kakahu ranei)

meaning list.meaning: tuhia he reta, he karere ranei

meaning list.sentence: She wrote out the entire report by hand.

meaning list.sentence: The team zeroed in on the cause of the problem.

meaning list.sentence: He zoned in on his studies before the exam.

meaning list.meaning: ki te ngaro te aro, ki te kotiti haere

meaning list.sentence: Her performance blew everyone away.

meaning list.meaning: ki te uhi, ki te takai

meaning list.meaning: ki te memeha haere, ka memeha haere

meaning list.meaning: Hinga i roto i te aroha

meaning list.sentence: The coach fired up the team before the game.

meaning list.meaning: ki te anga whakamua, ki te ahu whakamua

meaning list.meaning: Hei whakamahi i te kaha katoa, hei whakaatu i nga mea katoa

meaning list.meaning: korero tonu mo te mea kotahi

meaning list.meaning: ki te manawanui, ki te whakatete

meaning list.sentence: She held out her hand to greet him.

meaning list.meaning: to keep together, to stay together

meaning list.meaning: ki te hopu, ki te mau tonu

meaning list.sentence: The rain didn’t let up all day.

meaning list.sentence: He didn’t let up until the project was complete.

meaning list.meaning: ki te whai oranga, ki te noho i runga i tetahi mea

meaning list.sentence: He passed through the city for a conference.

meaning list.sentence: The media played up the risks of the new technology.

meaning list.sentence: My back has been playing up again.

meaning list.sentence: She popped in to say hello on her way to work.

meaning list.meaning: Ki te anga whakamua, ki te haere tonu me te whakatau

meaning list.sentence translation: Ahakoa nga uauatanga, ka anga whakamua tonu ratou ki ta ratou mahere.

meaning list.sentence: Someone ran off with her bag while she wasn’t looking.

meaning list.meaning: ki te haere, ki te timata i te haerenga

meaning list.meaning: ki te noho tae noa ki te mutunga, ki te manawanui

meaning list.meaning: ki te noho pono, ki te tautoko

meaning list.meaning: Ka timata ki te whakapau wa ki tetahi mea, ki tetahi ranei

meaning list.sentence translation: I muri i tana neke ki te taone nui, ka timata ia ki te noho tahi me tetahi roopu hoa hou.
